Answer: Okay hang onto your hats cause this one’s a doozy.Hey All,Let’s get this tsraight, I am going to be answering from the point of view of the MCU and I know people are going to hate me for it, however it is the version of Marvel that is now grossing the most money and will be easier for the non-comic readers to understand. Essentially. as told in the 2018 Black Panther movie, which just came out three days ago in the US, Vibranium first fell to Earth (by way of Meteor) back before mankind existed on the planet. It’s radioactive (deus-ex-machina magic) properties influenced the vegetation and wilOkay hang onto your hats cause this one’s a doozy.Hey All,Let’s get this tsraight, I am going to be answering from the point of view of the MCU and I know people are going to hate me for it, however it is the version of Marvel that is now grossing the most money and will be easier for the non-comic readers to understand. Essentially. as told in the 2018 Black Panther movie, which just came out three days ago in the US, Vibranium first fell to Earth (by way of Meteor) back before mankind existed on the planet. It’s radioactive (deus-ex-machina magic) properties influenced the vegetation and wildlife around the crash site, producing a very lush landscape full of vibrant flora and fauna. Eventually mankind came about, and the five tribes that settled down onto the site of the meteor determined that it was best to protect the secret of the world’s strongest metal. Now I am going to get a bit less Marvel historian (nerdy) here. Essentially, the people of Wakanda were given a leg up in the race when they settled upon the Earth’s largest depository of the strongest metal in existence. There’s probably some proper theory name but I’m calling it the Prometheus theory named after the Greek mythological titan who kick started the human race in terms of technology by stealing fire from Olympus and giving its secrets to humanity, allowing us the ability to create metals and fires and mine the elements of the Earth to get to where we are today. Pkay enough greek geeking, back to Wakanda. Essentially Vibranium is the biggest flame of the fire and Wakanda had it all to themselves. Thus they were able to advance at a much quicker rate. Think gemmers in Clash Of Clans vs. non gemmers (is that too old of a reference now?) Anyway, we do a fast forward from the tribes who have the world’s strongest metal in large quantities in the ground and we advance to the modern day, where some people outside of Wakanda wear rare and expensive suits made of Kevlar, which are susceptible to knives, while every fiber of clothing in Wakanda is able to withstand tank fire due to the kinetic absorbent properties of Vibranium which is weaved into it. They use it to make their vehicles, their armor, their trains, their mines. How does that even work? How does one mine the strongest element on Earth? Oh well IDK. Anyway that’s why. OH AND DON’T EVEN GET ME STARTED ON THE HEART SHAPED HERB.

Answer: What does that mean, “Advanced technology”? What is “advanced technology”? The “ancients” had lots of incredible technology that we have a hard time replicating today. One of the most advanced was barrel making. Do you know anything about barrel making? It’s one of the most advanced technologies of all time. Coopers had to serve an apprenticeship for years. The Coopers who failed ended up making “dry barrels” that only held produce or things that wouldn’t spoil. There are very few people who know how to make a barrel today. Even Jack Daniels, the biggest barrel maker in the world, uses an autoWhat does that mean, “Advanced technology”? What is “advanced technology”? The “ancients” had lots of incredible technology that we have a hard time replicating today. One of the most advanced was barrel making. Do you know anything about barrel making? It’s one of the most advanced technologies of all time. Coopers had to serve an apprenticeship for years. The Coopers who failed ended up making “dry barrels” that only held produce or things that wouldn’t spoil. There are very few people who know how to make a barrel today. Even Jack Daniels, the biggest barrel maker in the world, uses an automated process now because making them by hand is too slow. The art of coopering is dying. There are very, very few people who know how to make a barrel left in the world and fewer every year, yet barrel making was an advanced technology that changed the entire world for literally thousands of years.Incidentally. the most prolific barrel in the world today is the ASB or American Standard Barrel that hold 53 gallons because America makes more barrels than anyone else in the world. Many used Jack Daniels barrels are re-used to make other kinds of liquor in other parts of the world.Do you know who the highest paid man in the community was in “ancient times”? It was the Wheelwright.Making a wheel from wood with an axle that attaches to a cart and doesn’t fall apart within a mile or two is one of the most “advanced technologies” of all time. Without it, most civilizations would have failed or failed to spread. Cart wheels are complex and the forces must play against each other continuously to hold the wheel together as it rolls. A Cartwright made as much then as a jet airline pilot back does today. In the 1880s when the average wage was $1.50 a day, the Wheelwright was making 90 dollars a week. On the Mayflower they brought one single cart over to America and it was the most valuable thing on the ship manifest, worth more than 10 times the next most valuable thing on the ship. Can you make a cartwheel? It’s an “advanced technology” that very, very few people can make today, even with machine tools.What is an “advanced technology”?

Answer: Necrons do not recruit new members.However, if a Necron body sustains damage it cannot self repair it will be teleported to the nearest tomb complex. The Necron's mind is placed in storage, as a set of engrams, while the body is repaired or a new one fabricated. When a body is ready the mind is downloaded to produce a “new” Necron. Unfortunately, this comes at a price: each transfer cause the Necron's engrams to degrade, losing memories and aspects of its personality. Many Necron's have been transferred hundreds of times and have been reduced to mere automatons without any remnant of the sentiNecrons do not recruit new members.However, if a Necron body sustains damage it cannot self repair it will be teleported to the nearest tomb complex. The Necron's mind is placed in storage, as a set of engrams, while the body is repaired or a new one fabricated. When a body is ready the mind is downloaded to produce a “new” Necron. Unfortunately, this comes at a price: each transfer cause the Necron's engrams to degrade, losing memories and aspects of its personality. Many Necron's have been transferred hundreds of times and have been reduced to mere automatons without any remnant of the sentient being they once were.
